      • DriveInfo

        @Since(value="7.0")
public DriveInfo(Long capacity,
               Long driveID,
               Long nodeID,
               String serial,
               Long slot,
               String status,
               String type,
               Map<String,Object> attributes)
        Parameters:
        capacity - [required] Total capacity of the drive, in bytes.
        driveID - [required] DriveID for this drive.
        nodeID - [required] NodeID where this drive is located.
        serial - [required] Drive serial number.
        slot - [required] Slot number in the server chassis where this drive is located, or -1 if SATADimm used for internal metadata drive.
        status - [required]
        type - [required]
        attributes - [required] List of Name/Value pairs in JSON object format.
        Since:
        7.0
